title: anivia is actually really strong right now
body:
she is along with brand and malz one of the few mages who are still facerolling in soloq, I guess the mana buffs made her stronger in lane

however, I think a slight nerf to these champs is already due, brand is slowly getting more popular along with Anivia and soon they will be FotM

why not nerf them right now?

needs gutted asap
